modName: Guard armor changer  draugr armor no helmet and wearable
summary:
Another guard armor changer for markarth guard only.... (for the moment) 

It\'s the same armor (draugr armor) but, it\'s wearable and it doesn\'t have the helmet
descriptionHtml:
Another guard armor changer for markarth guard only.... (for the moment) 

It\'s the same armor (draugr armor) but, it\'s wearable and it doesn\'t have the helmet  


How to install: Just put the esp files in your skyrim data folder

How to uninstall: Delete the esp files in your data 


Note: If you kill the guards they will drop the draugr armor =)
author: zoombir

files.name: guard armor replacer  draugr no helmet  MARKARTH
